alert.note: Alert for Colbert (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 30 at 1:17AM CST until November 30 at 2:45AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Alabama, including the following county, Colbert. * WHEN...Until 245 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 113 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Littleville, Leighton, Whiteoak and La Grange. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
